mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO dwd_industry_chain_node (id, industry_chain_id, industry_chain_name, node_name, line_info, ordinate_value,abscissa_value, tache,down_node_id,up_node_id, node_virtual_location,node_type, chain_node_introduce, node_order,node_level,node_parent_id, is_leaf,show_max_number, deleted,gmt_create,gmt_modify,create_by, update_by, data_source) VALUES
(#{do.id}, #{do.industryChainId}, #{do.industryChainName}, #{do.nodeName}, #{do.lineInfo}, #{do.ordinateValue},#{do.abscissaValue}, #{do.tache},#{do.downNodeId},#{do.upNodeId}, #{do.nodeVirtualLocation}, #{do.nodeType},#{do.chainNodeIntroduce}, #{do.nodeOrder},#{do.nodeLevel},#{do.nodeParentId}, #{do.isLeaf},#{do.showMaxNumber}, #{do.deleted}, #{do.gmtCreate}, #{do.gmtModify},#{do.createBy}, #{do.updateBy}, #{do.dataSource})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE industry_chain_id = values(industry_chain_id), industry_chain_name = values(industry_chain_name), node_name = values(node_name), line_info = values(line_info), ordinate_value = values(abscissa_value), tache = values(tache), down_node_id = values(down_node_id), up_node_id = values(up_node_id), node_virtual_location = values(node_virtual_location), node_type = values(node_type), chain_node_introduce = values(chain_node_introduce), node_order = values(node_order), node_level = values(node_level), node_parent_id = values(node_parent_id), is_leaf = values(is_leaf), show_max_number = values(show_max_number), deleted = VALUES(deleted), gmt_create = VALUES(gmt_create), gmt_modify = VALUES(gmt_modify), create_by = VALUES(create_by), update_by = VALUES(update_by)
